attributes.action: Make Armistice Day a day of conflict education for ALL UK schoolchildren
attributes.additional_details:
To honour and respect all those that have sacrificed or suffered as a result of conflicts, let us create a one day education programme about the causes and prevention of War and conflict between cultures.

Armed Forces and Civilians casualties and those left behind to repair shattered lives, should know that their loss has led to an education programme of total remembrance. A legacy to the fallen.
